title: Hanged (Savage Men Book 5)
features: That’s only a few of the names people call me, and all of them are true.I did the unforgivable. I killed a man in broad daylight.I did it for

I paid my dues, did my time.Now I’m out and I want her back, no matter the cost.She hates me, but that won’t stop me from hunting after her.I need her to be mine again.And there’s a secret I have to tell …But everything has its price.I’m willing to pay.Is she?
Hanged is a Standalone Dark Romance NOVELLA from New York Times & USA Today Bestselling Author Clarissa Wild, previously titled The Hanged Man.
Note: This story contains disturbing content that may be offensive to some readers.
